column5: Off to Hillcrest yesterday to pick up the Salmon then dropped a Cooler off for Ripley for their Salmon release, over to the Kincardine Hatchery to meet Al Wilkins & Steve Carvell to get ready for the Salmon Release & Hatchery Tour then off to Wiarton for a Class Presentation & to pick up the salmon & Release them in Kincardine. Ripley released their salmon today & Ripley Elementary school & Kincardine High School Class toured the Hatchery.Thanx & Tight Lines SBK  http://lhfcschoolhatcheries.blogspot.ca/2014/05/hillcrest-jksk-hatchery-tour.html
